Legal Information

Copyright

Copyright © 2013–2022 Marcus Downing.

License

This product is released under the Artistic License 2.0, and uses properties covered by the Open Game License.

In short, you can take any part of this project, keep it, modify it, share it, and even charge money for it. The only condition is that you must be honest about where it came from by linking back to this website.

Licensing Terms

For the purposes of the license, the "source" is defined as the Illustrator files, script files and other original creations covered under product identity below, as well as the source code for this website; and "compiled form" is defined as any PDF or HTML file produced as a product of these files, including those produced using this website.

OGL Open Content

The following items are hereby identified as Product Identity, as defined in the Open Game License version 1.0a, Section 1(e), and are not Open Content: the visual design, layout and appearance of the character sheets, the source code of this website and the attached Build My Character tool, and the scripts used to manipulate the character sheets.

Elements that have previously been designated as Open Game Content, are in the public domain or have previously been identified as product identity by another vendor are not included in this declaration.

Except for material designated as Product Identity (see above) or the property of other companies, the game mechanics used in this product are Open Game Content, as defined in the Open Gaming License version 1.0a Section 1(d).

We are expressly prohibited from charging you to use or access this content. These character sheets are not published, endorsed, or specifically approved by Paizo. For more information about Paizo Inc. and Paizo products, visit paizo.com.

Dungeons & Dragons

These character sheets are not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or specifically approved by Wizards of the Coast LLC. These character sheets may use the trademarks and other intellectual property of Wizards of the Coast LLC, which is permitted under Wizards' Fan Site Policy. For example, Dungeons & Dragons® is a trademark(s) of Wizards of the Coast. For more information about Wizards of the Coast or any of Wizards' trademarks or other intellectual property, please visit their website at www.wizards.com.

Fonts

These character sheets use the fonts Roboto (released under the Google Android License) and Merriweather (released under the Open Font License).

Dyslexie is used with permission from Dyslexie Font B.V., Netherlands.

Connexion

Patrons get the ability to edit all the fields, have calculations work automatically, and save character sheets. Login with Patreon to unlock these features:

Login with Patreon

Logging in will set a cookie on your PC. This does not contain any personally identifiable information, and will not be sent to any third party.

Become a patron

Support the site and gain access to extra features for just $1 by becoming a patron.
